query.query: {"measures":[],"pigql":"a = load \"user1\"; a = filter a by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = group a by 'UniqueUserName'; a = foreach a generate 'UniqueUserName' as 'UniqueUserName';","groups":["UniqueUserName"]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent","color"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(percent_pipe_generated.result, 0, \"sum_percent\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#D4504C\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","autoFilter":false}

{"measures":[["sum","ForecastAmount"]],"pigql":"f = load \"forecasting_item1\";   f = filter f by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('Period.StartDate_Year', 'Period.StartDate_Month', 'Period.StartDate_Day')\")}}; f = filter f by 'ForecastingType.MasterLabel' == \"Opportunity Revenue\"; f = filter f by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; g = filter f by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; h = filter f by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}};final = group g by all full, h by all; final = foreach final generate (case when  (\"{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, \"Role.RoleNames\").asString()}}\" == \"null\" && \"{{cell(direct_reports.selection, 0, \"UniqueUserName\").asString()}}\" == \"null\") then 0  when (\"{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, \"Role.RoleNames\").asString()}}\" != \"null\" && \"{{cell(direct_reports.selection, 0, \"UniqueUserName\").asString()}}\" == \"null\") then coalesce(sum(h['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']),0) when (\"{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, \"Role.RoleNames\").asString()}}\" != \"null\" && \"{{cell(direct_reports.selection, 0, \"UniqueUserName\").asString()}}\" != \"null\") then coalesce(sum(g['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']),0) else coalesce(sum(g['ForecastAmount']),0) end) as'sum_ForecastAmount';"}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["RecordType.Name"],"filters":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","pipe_coverage"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(quota_left_next_quarter.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'quota_next_quarter', {{coalesce(cell(pipe_next_quarter.result, 0, \"sum_Amount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'pipe_next_quarter'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'quota_next_quarter' == 0 then 1 else 'pipe_next_quarter' / 'quota_next_quarter' end) as 'sum_pipe_coverage';"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["Account.Name","Name","Owner.UniqueUserName","CloseDate","ForecastCategory","StageName"],"filters":[["IsClosed",["false"],"in"],["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}"],["Type","{{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}"],["StageName","{{column(opportunity_amount_by_stage.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asObject()}}"],["Name","{{column(top_opportunities.selection, [\"Name\"]).asObject()}}"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]],"filters":[["StartDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["User.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["User.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; q = filter q by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', \"Forecast No Adjustments\" as 'Legend'; f = load \"forecasting_item1\"; f = foreach f generate {{coalesce(cell(kpi_forecast_adjustment.result, 0, \"sum_ForecastAmount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_Amount', \"Forecast including Adjustments\" as 'Legend'; u = union q,f;","groups":["Legend"]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"opp = load \"opportunity1\"; opp = filter opp by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day')\")}}; today = foreach opp generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; last_week = filter opp by date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day') in [..\"7 day ago\"]; last_week = foreach last_week generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; s = group today by all full, last_week by all; s = foreach s generate (case when (coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']), 0) == 0 && coalesce(sum(today['Amount']), 0) > 0) then 1.0 else (coalesce(sum(today['Amount']), 0) - sum(last_week['Amount'])) / sum(last_week['Amount'])end) as 'sum_percent';"}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity1\"; a = filter a by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = group a by 'ForecastCategoryName'; a = foreach a generate 'ForecastCategoryName' as 'ForecastCategoryName', (case when 'ForecastCategoryName' == \"Closed\" then - 1 else avg('Stage.SortOrder')end) as 'SortOrder'; a = order a by 'SortOrder' asc;","measures":[],"groups":["ForecastCategoryName"]}

{"pigql":"opp = load \"opportunity1\"; opp = filter opp by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; opp = filter opp by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; opp = filter opp by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; today = foreach opp generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; last_week = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [..\"7 day ago\"]; last_week = foreach last_week generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; s = group today by all full, last_week by all; s = foreach s generate (case when (coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']), 0) == 0 && coalesce(sum(today['Amount']), 0) > 0) then 1.0 else (coalesce(sum(today['Amount']), 0) - sum(last_week['Amount'])) / sum(last_week['Amount'])end) as 'sum_percent';","measures":[["count","*","sum_percent"]],"measuresMap":{},"groups":[]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = foreach q generate (case when (\"{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, \"Role.RoleNames\").asString()}}\" == \"null\" && \"{{cell(direct_reports.selection, 0, \"UniqueUserName\").asString()}}\" == \"null\") then \"Please select a person for Adjusted Forecast to populate.\" when (\"{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, \"Role.RoleNames\").asString()}}\" != \"null\" || \"{{cell(direct_reports.selection, 0, \"UniqueUserName\").asString()}}\" != \"null\") then \"Please note that adjusted forecasts may not be able to filter by Opportunity or Record Type.\" else \" \" end) as 'list_text';","measures":[["list","text"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["Product.Product.Name"],"filters":[["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["ForecastCategoryName","{{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["StageName","{{column(opportunity_amount_by_stage.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asObject()}}"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"measures":[["sum","remaining_quota"]],"pigql":"won_plus_forecast = load \"opportunity1\"; won_plus_forecast = filter won_plus_forecast by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; won_plus_forecast = filter won_plus_forecast by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; won_plus_forecast = filter won_plus_forecast by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}} || 'IsWon' == \"true\"; won_plus_forecast = filter won_plus_forecast by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; won_plus_forecast = filter won_plus_forecast by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; won_plus_forecast = filter won_plus_forecast by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; quota = load \"quota1\"; quota = filter quota by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; quota = filter quota by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; quota = filter quota by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; remaining_quota = group won_plus_forecast by all full, quota by all; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate sum(quota['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(won_plus_forecast['Amount']), 0) as 'amount'; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'sum_remaining_quota';"}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity1\"; a = filter a by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; a = group a by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Week'); a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CloseDate_Week' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Week', sum(sum('Amount')) over([.. 0] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Week')) as 'sum_Amount';","measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":[["CloseDate_Year","CloseDate_Week"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","remaining_quota"]],"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity1\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; b = load \"quota1\"; b = filter b by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate sum(b['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) as 'amount'; c = foreach c generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'sum_remaining_quota';"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; quota_next_quarter = group q by all; quota_next_quarter = foreach quota_next_quarter generate {{coalesce(cell(quota_left_next_quarter.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_Amount', \"Next Quarter\" as 'Period', \"Quota Left\" as 'What'; quota_next_month = group q by all; quota_next_month = foreach quota_next_month generate {{coalesce(cell(quota_left_next_month.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_Amount', \"Next Month\" as 'Period', \"Quota Left\" as 'What'; pipe_next_quarter = group q by all; pipe_next_quarter = foreach pipe_next_quarter generate {{coalesce(cell(pipe_next_quarter.result, 0, \"sum_Amount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_Amount', \"Next Quarter\" as 'Period', \"Open Pipe\" as 'What'; pipe_next_month = group q by all; pipe_next_month = foreach pipe_next_month generate {{coalesce(cell(pipe_next_month.result, 0, \"sum_Amount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_Amount', \"Next Month\" as 'Period', \"Open Pipe\" as 'What'; u = union quota_next_quarter, quota_next_month, pipe_next_quarter, pipe_next_month; u = order u by 'Period';","groups":["Period","What"]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; q = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 month ahead\"..\"1 month ahead\"]; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'sum_Amount';"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; q = filter q by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'sum_Amount';"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["Account.Name"],"filters":[["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["StageName","{{column(opportunity_amount_by_stage.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asObject()}}"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"measures":[["sum","percent","color"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(percent_closed_won.result, 0, \"sum_percent\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#D4504C\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","autoFilter":false}

{"measures":[["sum","percent"]],"pigql":"opp_history = load \"pipeline_trending1\"; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategory.ForecastCategoryName\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Type\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; opp_history = filter opp_history by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; today = filter opp_history by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in [\"1 day ahead\"..]; today = foreach today generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; last_week = filter opp_history by date('ValidFromDate_Year', 'ValidFromDate_Month', 'ValidFromDate_Day') in [..\"8 days ago\"]; last_week = filter last_week by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in [\"7 days ago\"..]; last_week = foreach last_week generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; s = group today by all full, last_week by all; s = foreach s generate (case when (coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']), 0) == 0 && {{coalesce(cell(kpi_open_pipe.result,0, \"sum_Amount\"),0).asObject()}} > 0) then 1.0 else ({{coalesce(cell(kpi_open_pipe.result,0, \"sum_Amount\"),0).asObject()}} - sum(last_week['Amount'])) / sum(last_week['Amount'])end) as 'sum_percent';"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"filters":[["IsWon",["true"],"in"],["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"filters":[["CreatedDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"]]}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["Role.RoleNames"],"filters":[["ForecastEnabled",["true"],"in"],["hasOpportunity",["true"],"in"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["Name"],"filters":[["CloseDate","{{column(time_dropdown.selection, [\"current\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.UniqueUserName","{{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Owner.Role.RoleNames","{{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["RecordType.Name","{{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["Type","{{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["ForecastCategoryName","{{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asObject()}}","in"],["StageName","{{column(opportunity_amount_by_stage.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asObject()}}"]],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

team_details_table.query: f = load "forecasting_item1"; f = filter f by {{column(direct_reports.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]).asEquality("User.UniqueUserName")}}; f = filter f by {{column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]).asEquality("User.Role.RoleNames")}}; f = filter f by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('Period.StartDate_Year', 'Period.StartDate_Month', 'Period.StartDate_Day')")}}; f = filter f by 'ForecastingType.MasterLabel' == "Opportunity Revenue"; pipeline = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Pipeline"; closed = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Closed"; commit = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Commit"; bestcase = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Best Case"; forecast = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' != "Pipeline"; quota = load "quota1"; quota = filter quota by {{column(direct_reports.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]).asEquality("User.UniqueUserName")}}; quota = filter quota by {{column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]).asEquality("User.Role.RoleNames")}}; quota = filter quota by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')")}}; u = load "user1"; u = filter u by {{column(direct_reports.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]).asEquality("UniqueUserName")}}; u = filter u by 'IsActive' == "true"; u = filter u by {{column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]).asEquality("Role.RoleNames")}}; c = group closed by 'OwnerId' full, commit by 'OwnerId' full, bestcase by 'OwnerId' full, pipeline by 'OwnerId' full, forecast by 'OwnerId' full, quota by 'User.Id'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(first(closed['User.UniqueUserName']), first(quota['User.UniqueUserName']), first(commit['User.UniqueUserName']),  first(bestcase['User.UniqueUserName']), first(forecast['User.UniqueUserName'])) as 'User Name',  (case when (coalesce(sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) - coalesce(sum(closed['AmountWithoutAdjustments']),0)) > 0  then (coalesce(sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) - coalesce(sum(closed['AmountWithoutAdjustments']),0)) else 0 end) as 'Quota Remaining',  sum(closed['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Won', sum(commit['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Commit',  (case when first(commit['User.UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]),"0").asObject()}}"]  then sum(commit['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(commit['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Commit',   sum(bestcase['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Best Case', (case when first(bestcase['User.UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]),"0").asObject()}}"] then sum(bestcase['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(bestcase['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Best Case',  sum(pipeline['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Pipeline', sum(forecast['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Forecast',  (case when first(forecast['User.UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]),"0").asObject()}}"]  then sum(forecast['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(forecast['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Forecast';

query.query: {"measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"quota1\"; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day') in [\"1 quarter ahead\"..\"1 quarter ahead\"]; opp = load \"opportunity1\"; opp = filter opp by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; opp = filter opp by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; opp = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 quarter ahead\"..\"1 quarter ahead\"]; remaining_quota = group q by all full, opp by all; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (coalesce(sum(q['QuotaAmount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(opp['Amount']), 0)) as 'remaining'; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (case when sum('remaining') < 0 then 0 else sum('remaining') end) as 'sum_QuotaAmount';"}

team_details_table_no_quota.query: f = load "forecasting_item1"; f = filter f by {{column(direct_reports.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]).asEquality("User.UniqueUserName")}}; f = filter f by {{column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]).asEquality("User.Role.RoleNames")}}; f = filter f by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, "current").asDateRange("date('Period.StartDate_Year', 'Period.StartDate_Month', 'Period.StartDate_Day')")}}; f = filter f by 'ForecastingType.MasterLabel' == "Opportunity Revenue"; pipeline = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Pipeline"; closed = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Closed"; commit = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Commit"; bestcase = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' == "Best Case"; forecast = filter f by 'ForecastCategoryName' != "Pipeline"; u = load "user1"; u = filter u by {{column(direct_reports.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]).asEquality("UniqueUserName")}}; u = filter u by 'IsActive' == "true"; u = filter u by {{column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]).asEquality("Role.RoleNames")}}; c = group closed by 'OwnerId' full, commit by 'OwnerId' full, bestcase by 'OwnerId' full, pipeline by 'OwnerId' full, forecast by 'OwnerId'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(first(closed['User.UniqueUserName']),  first(commit['User.UniqueUserName']),  first(bestcase['User.UniqueUserName']), first(forecast['User.UniqueUserName'])) as  'User Name',    sum(closed['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Won', sum(commit['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Commit',     (case when first(commit['User.UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]),"0").asObject()   }}"]  then sum(commit['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(commit['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Commit',      sum(bestcase['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Best Case', (case when first(bestcase['User.UniqueUserName']) in    ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]),"0").asObject()}}"] then    sum(bestcase['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(bestcase['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Best Case',     sum(pipeline['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Pipeline', sum(forecast['AmountWithoutAdjustments']) as 'Forecast',     (case when first(forecast['User.UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["Role.RoleNames"]),"0").asObject()}}"]  then sum(forecast['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(forecast['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Forecast';

query.query: {"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = filter q by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; q = group q by 'StageName'; q = foreach q generate 'StageName' as 'StageName', sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', max('Stage.SortOrder') as 'SortOrder'; q = order q by 'SortOrder';","autoFilter":true,"groups":["StageName"]}

{"measures":[["sum","QuotaAmount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"quota1\"; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day') in [\"1 month ahead\"..\"1 month ahead\"]; opp = load \"opportunity1\"; opp = filter opp by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; opp = filter opp by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; opp = filter opp by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; opp = filter opp by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 month ahead\"..\"1 month ahead\"]; remaining_quota = group q by all full, opp by all; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (coalesce(sum(q['QuotaAmount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(opp['Amount']), 0)) as 'remaining'; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (case when sum('remaining') < 0 then 0 else sum('remaining') end) as 'sum_QuotaAmount';"}

{"measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = filter q by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; q = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 quarter ahead\"..\"1 quarter ahead\"]; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'sum_Amount';"}

{"measures":[["sum","percent","color"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(percent_open_pipe.result, 0, \"sum_percent\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then \"#4ED469\" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then \"#ED3251\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';","autoFilter":false}
{"measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["Type"]}

{"pigql":"won = load \"opportunity1\"; won = filter won by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; won = filter won by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; won = filter won by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; won = filter won by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; quota = load \"quota1\"; quota = filter quota by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; quota = filter quota by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; quota = filter quota by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; remaining_quota = group won by all full, quota by all; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate sum(quota['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(won['Amount']), 0) as 'amount'; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'remaining_quota'; open = load \"opportunity1\"; open = filter open by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; open = filter open by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; open = filter open by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; open = filter open by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; open = filter open by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; open = filter open by {{column(open_forecast_categories.selection, [\"ForecastCategoryName\"]).asEquality(\"ForecastCategoryName\")}}; open = filter open by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; coverage = group remaining_quota by all full, open by all; coverage = foreach coverage generate coalesce(sum(open['Amount']), 0) as 'amount', sum(remaining_quota['remaining_quota']) as 'remaining_quota'; coverage = foreach coverage generate round(coalesce(sum('amount') / sum('remaining_quota'), 0), 1) as 'sum_pipe_coverage'; f = filter coverage by 'sum_pipe_coverage' > 0;","measures":[["sum","pipe_coverage"]]}

{"measures":[["sum","quota_attainment"]],"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity1\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by {{column(RecordType_Name.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Opportunity_Type.selection, [\"Type\"]).asEquality(\"Type\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.UniqueUserName\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.RoleNames\")}}; a = filter a by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day')\")}}; b = load \"quota1\"; b = filter b by {{column(direct_reports.selection, [\"UniqueUserName\"]).asEquality(\"User.UniqueUserName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(manager_role.selection, [\"Role.RoleNames\"]).asEquality(\"User.Role.RoleNames\")}}; b = filter b by {{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asDateRange(\"date('StartDate_Year', 'StartDate_Month', 'StartDate_Day')\")}}; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate (case when sum(a['Amount']) / sum(b['QuotaAmount']) > 0 then sum(a['Amount']) / sum(b['QuotaAmount']) else 0 end) as 'sum_quota_attainment';"}

{"measures":[["sum","pipe_coverage"]],"pigql":"q = load \"opportunity1\"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(quota_left_next_month.result, 0, \"sum_QuotaAmount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'quota_next_month', {{coalesce(cell(pipe_next_month.result, 0, \"sum_Amount\"), 0).asObject()}} as 'pipe_next_month'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'quota_next_month' == 0 then 1 else 'pipe_next_month' / 'quota_next_month' end) as 'sum_pipe_coverage';"}
